answers.answer: Hi:It's entirely possible that your suffering from some type of nerve issue like that of Neuropathy or Radicolopathy (sp)...Have you been seen by a Neurologist?. I would definitly make an appt. to see one if you haven't.Please take care,Mollyrae

I agree with mollyrae, it sounds like a nerve issue.  Have you had any kind of injury to the areas that have been hurting?  It may help to see your doctor and tell him/her what is going on and they might be able to  help you out.  How long has this been going on?  Does the pain/discomfort seem to be the same or has it gotten worse as time goes on?
